root.name: Club Football
root.description: Club Football was released in 18 different editions which included clubs such as: Manchester United (Premier League) Arsenal Club Football Liverpool Football Club (Premier League) Arsenal Football Club (Premier League) Celtic Football Club (Scottish Premier League) Rangers Football Club ( Scottish Premier League) Leed United (Premier League) Aston Villa Football Club (Premier League) Real Madrid (La Liga) Chelsea Football Club (Premier League) Newcastle United Club Football (Premier League) The above 10 were focused at UK retail, however other games in the franchise include: AC Milan (Serie A) Juventus (Serie A) Ajax (Eredivisie) Borussia Dortmund (German Premier League) Inter Milan (Serie A) Bayern Munich (German Premier League) Hamburger SV (German Premier League) Barcelona FC (La Liga) In terms of graphics and gameplay all 18 games were the same, however factors such as players, clothing, stadiums and names of players and managers were tailored for each game. Although competent Club Football never managed to break the hold in the soccer game realm that FIFA and Pro Evolution Soccer have.
